publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1699.1 Nicola Sturgeon: Primary Careâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1699) in the name of Susan Deacon, leave out from "and affirms" to end and insert "notes the recent survey conducted by the Scottish General Practitioners Committee which found that primary care in Scotland is facing a crisis, with low morale and increasing levels of stress amongst general practitioners, and concludes that the Scottish Executive has a great deal still to do to develop primary care services in Scotland." Supported by: Shona Robison*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*
